description.narrative: By 2021, families, communities, and national and local actors have acquired new skills to improve the protection of children from violence and harmful practices, including child marriage

sector.narrative: Child Protection humanitarian AoR/humanitarian sector coordination
Services to prevent or respond to violence, exploitation and abuse
Technical assistance - Prevention and response services for violence against children

title.narrative: Central African Republic United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Central African Republic Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change (Child Protection)
UNICEF Programmes in Central African Republic
Central African Republic Country Programme Document 2018-2021
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2021, families, communities, and national and local actors have acquired new skills to improve the protection of children from violence and harmful practices, including child marriage

description.narrative:
9350 children (including 2433 girl children) at risk or victims of violence were identified and supported (75% of the planned target). This included 1341 conflict affected children victims of gender-based violence. 1006 received legal assistance while 1902 were referred to health services.
| Status:Constrained | As-of Date:31/01/2020

title.narrative: Existence of a strategy to combat child marriage and violence
Percentage of girls who are victims of child marriage / sexual violence and cared for
Number of women, men, girls and boys targeted by social norm change interventions or other GBV-related information or awareness intervention
Number of people who participate in social and behavior change communication interventions promoting elimination of VAC through UNICEF programmes
Proportion of schools and other community structures with a committee for the prevention of violence and child marriage
Existence of an action plan on child protection

actual.value: 2019:A costed GBV strategy ( which also addresses child mariage) was approved by the Government
